description:
Monitor authentication logs for system and application login failures of [Valid Accounts](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1078). Consider the following event IDs:(Citation: Trimarc Detecting Password Spraying)
Domain Controllers: "Audit Logon" (Success & Failure) for event ID 4625.
Domain Controllers: "Audit Kerberos Authentication Service" (Success & Failure) for event ID 4771.
All systems: "Audit Logon" (Success & Failure) for event ID 4648.

external_references.description: Metcalf, S. (2018, May 6). Trimarc Research: Detecting Password Spraying with Security Event Auditing. Retrieved January 16, 2019.
